thread.title: Tina Tange

author: Tina Tange
title: Tina Tange
text: Do not use this car rental. Although we had bought extra insurance from home, we have to buy an additional insurance before they would hand over the car to us. The alternative was to put â‚¬ 1,000 because they would not accept our visa card. They claimed that their computer indicated that our credit card was a bedit card, despite the fact that all Danes have this card and use it as a credit card.
